data.lyric:
[ti:Tombstone (Explicit)]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:Tombstone (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Tombstone (Explicit) - Rod Wave
[00:00.45]Lyrics by：Rodarius Green/Eric Foley Jr./Jaylon Howard/Jaidyn Hullum
[00:01.70]D**n this motherf**ker too crazy Saucii
[00:07.57]Let that s**t ride Eighty8
[00:15.07]When the s**t over it's over
[00:16.47]I don't know what's after or you know
[00:21.76]I keep my gun in my drawers ducking the sad news
[00:24.18]Oh yeah
[00:24.61]My phone say seven missed calls I know it's bad news
[00:27.15]This life had left me so scarred I'm knowing that's true
[00:29.94]Remember times got so hard I got it tattoed
[00:32.83]So hard
[00:34.28]I ain't did no shows but made some bread
[00:36.19]Yeah
[00:36.45]I gotta keep the family fed
[00:38.86]Yeah yeah
[00:39.58]Look just talked to pops about the feds
[00:42.01]I ain't gon' lie he had me scared uh
[00:45.52]I feel 'em coming n***a
[00:46.72]Yeah
[00:46.97]I'll keep on running n***a
[00:48.10]Yeah
[00:48.49]If we go down bad keep it a hundred n***a
[00:50.77]My girl all in my ear screaming "Spend some time"
[00:53.71]I promise I'll be here when I can get some time
[00:56.35]Right now I got to get what's mine
[00:58.94]For sure
[00:59.54]I'll be thuggin' 'til the end of time
[01:01.98]And f**k these n***as 'cause they lame
[01:03.35]Since they love saying my name
[01:05.10]Make sure you write the truest in the motherf**king game
[01:07.55]On my tombstone when they bury me
[01:11.41]By the river they will carry me
[01:14.21]Finally I'll be resting in peace
[01:16.97]Finally finally
[01:20.25]I'll get to fly away somewhere someday
[01:25.33]F**k these n***as 'cause they lame
[01:26.61]Since they love saying my name
[01:28.07]Yeah
[01:28.35]Make sure you write the truest in the game
[01:30.20]On my tombstone when they bury me
[01:33.43]Yeah
[01:34.05]By the river they will carry me
[01:36.39]Yeah
[01:36.70]Finally I'll be resting in peace
[01:38.81]Oh yeah
[01:39.49]Finally finally yeah yeah yeah yeah
[01:45.30]You know what I'm saying
[01:46.02]I don't really know what I'm saying
[01:46.97]I don't know what's after this s**t
[01:48.02]Finally finally
[01:49.42]Everybody think they know but f**k it I sleep on the floor
[01:53.23]Yeah yeah yeah yeah
[01:55.50]This s**t comes with a lot
[01:56.68]It's a lot of pressure I'm a young n***a though
[01:58.54]Yeah yeah yeah yeah
[01:59.68]On my tombstone when they bury me
[02:02.13]Believe that man I'm a hustler
[02:03.84]Yeah yeah yeah yeah on my tombstone when they bury me yeah oh
[02:09.77]Yeah yeah yeah yeah finally I'll be resting in peace
[02:13.41]Finally finally on my tombstone when they bury me
[02:19.72]By the river they will carry me I'll be resting in peace
[02:24.63]Finally finally yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Tombstone (Explicit)]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:Tombstone (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.45]//
[00:01.70]Saucii制作
[00:07.57]Eighty8制作
[00:15.07]当这些纷争结束时 一切都落下帷幕
[00:16.47]我不知道接下来会发生什么 你明白的
[00:21.76]我把枪放进抽屉里 仿佛我从未听过这个噩耗
[00:24.18]//
[00:24.61]我的手机显示有七通未接来电 我知道这是坏消息
[00:27.15]这样的生活让我伤痕累累 我知道这就是现实
[00:29.94]我把那些艰难的岁月纹在身上 时刻提醒自己
[00:32.83]如此艰难
[00:34.28]我没法上台演出 但是我努力赚钱
[00:36.19]//
[00:36.45]我得养家糊口
[00:38.86]//
[00:39.58]听着 我刚和爸爸说了联邦警察的事
[00:42.01]我没骗人 他让我害怕不已
[00:45.52]我感觉他们步步紧逼 哥们
[00:46.72]//
[00:46.97]我会不停地奔跑 哥们
[00:48.10]//
[00:48.49]纵使我们一蹶不振 也要保持真实 哥们
[00:50.77]我的妹子在我耳边呐喊 花时间陪她
[00:53.71]等我有空的时候 我保证我会陪在你身边
[00:56.35]此时此刻 我要拿到属于我的东西
[00:58.94]毫无疑问
[00:59.54]我会奋力拼搏 直到生命的最后一刻
[01:01.98]对这些家伙不屑一顾 因为他们微不足道
[01:03.35]因为他们喜欢把我的名字挂在嘴边
[01:05.10]确保你写下这个圈子里最真实的人
[01:07.55]当他们埋葬我时 如实地写在我的墓碑上
[01:11.41]将我葬在河边 河水会承载着我的灵魂
[01:14.21]最终 我会得以安息
[01:16.97]最终
[01:20.25]总有一天 我会远走高飞
[01:25.33]对这些家伙不屑一顾 因为他们微不足道
[01:26.61]因为他们喜欢把我的名字挂在嘴边
[01:28.07]//
[01:28.35]确保你写下这个圈子里最真实的人
[01:30.20]当他们埋葬我时 如实地写在我的墓碑上
[01:33.43]//
[01:34.05]将我葬在河边 河水会承载着我的灵魂
[01:36.39]//
[01:36.70]最终 我会得以安息
[01:38.81]//
[01:39.49]最终
[01:45.30]你明白我的意思吧
[01:46.02]我不知道自己在说什么
[01:46.97]我不知道接下来会发什么
[01:48.02]最终
[01:49.42]每个人都自以为是 但是去他的 我躺在地上酣睡
[01:53.23]//
[01:55.50]这一切带来许多东西
[01:56.68]承受着巨大的压力 尽管我年纪轻轻
[01:58.54]//
[01:59.68]当他们埋葬我时 如实地写在我的墓碑上
[02:02.13]相信这个人 我是个骗子
[02:03.84]当他们埋葬我时 如实地写在我的墓碑上
[02:09.77]最终 我会得以安息
[02:13.41]最终 当他们埋葬我时 如实地写在我的墓碑上
[02:19.72]将我葬在河边 河水会承载着我的灵魂 我会得以安息
[02:24.63]最终
